item.description: Leviathan Security Red Canary Beyond Trust Intel471 Synack Domino Data Labs Java software engineer

item.title: About
item.description: In no particular order: engineer, security researcher, tinkerer, devil’s advocate, husband, dad, cyclist, recovering cynic. Broad range of professional interests which include technical recruiting, team building, and mentoring. Focused on building healthy, proactive engineering culture through empathy, shared responsibility, automation, and empowerment. Engineering joy derived from designing and building: distributed platforms, service integrations, CI/CD pipelines, security pipelines, and automated tests of all types to name a few. Automation alleviates toil and increases feature velocity.
